intro: This document serves as a comprehensive guide for creating technical documentation within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) framework. It provides detailed instructions on leveraging Quarto, a powerful tool for crafting professional, readable documents using Markdown. The guide covers essential aspects such as project folder structure, Markdown syntax, document rendering, and the review and publication processes, ensuring that technical documentation is consistent, clear, and easily accessible.
keywords: DOCX to QMD conversion with Pandoc
